channel.title: Cult leader convert went through Butler party
channel.description:
#### What happened? 1. Night 1: I used Party as a Butler. 2. Cult leader converted me on Night 1 #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Cult leader was supposed to have been occupied.
#### Steps to reproduce: 1. Use court wizard swap on target 2. Use butler party 3. Use Cult Leader conversion on target of swap (not the butler).
#### Comments: Apparently a Court Wizard swapped 11/12(me). This must have caused the convert to go through party.
Log: http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=52785689521239340156 Cap: https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/885385098247010107/9D481B344305E83E57191BEBBEC13B8DE462BD97/

item.title: Cult leader convert went through Butler party
item.dc:creator: rpg711
item.description:
What happened?

  1. Night 1: I used Party as a Butler.
  2. Cult leader converted me on Night 1

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Cult leader was supposed to have been occupied.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Use court wizard swap on target
  2. Use butler party
  3. Use Cult Leader conversion on target of swap (not the butler).

Comments:

Apparently a Court Wizard swapped 11/12(me). This must have caused the convert to go through party.

Log: http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=52785689521239340156
Cap: https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/885385098247010107/9D481B344305E83E57191BEBBEC13B8DE462BD97/

Read full topic
item.source: Cult leader convert went through Butler party
